title: Drawing, 1725–50
medium: Pen and ink on laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed, lower left: Illnis Sigre Ine; reverse: accountings
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: A woman carrying a disk, shown from the right back. Top right: top of a jug; a sphinx crouches on cover. Right center: a mantelpiece with alternative suggestions. Bottom right: half figure of a cleric shown from the back, passing beneath a gateway.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, 1725–50. Pen and ink on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1324.
